00026         int MathManager::nearestPowerOfTwo(const int &input) const
00027         {
00028             int value = 1;
00029             while(value<input)
00030                 value <<= 1;
00031             return value;
00032         }

00034         void MathManager::newRandomSeed() const
00035         {
00036             srand((unsigned int) time(0));
00037         }

00040         {

00042         }

00044         int MathManager::randInt(const int &minimum, const int &maximum) const
00045         {
00046             if(minimum == maximum)
00047                 return minimum;
00048             else
00049                 return minimum + rand()%(maximum-minimum);
00050         }

00052         float MathManager::randFloat() const
00053         {
00054             return rand()/((float)(RAND_MAX)+1.0f);
00055         }

00057         float MathManager::randFloat(const float &maximum) const
00058         {
00059             return randFloat() * maximum;
00060         }
00061 
00062         float MathManager::randFloat(const float &minimum,
00063                                      const float &maximum) const
00064         {
00065             return minimum + randFloat()*(maximum-minimum);
00066         }

00068         bool MathManager::randBool(const float &chance) const
00069         {
00070             return randFloat() < chance;
00071         }

00073         bool MathManager::getLowestPositiveRoot(float a, float b, float c,
00074                 float treshold, float *root) const
00075         {
00076             /* Calculate determinant. */
00077             float d = b * b - 4.0f * a * c;
00078 
00079             /* No solution. */
00080             if(d < 0.0f)
00081                 return false;
00082 
00083             /* Calculate the two roots. */
00084             float sqrtD = sqrt(d);
00085             float x1 = (-b - sqrtD) / (2.0f * a);
00086             float x2 = (-b + sqrtD) / (2.0f * a);
00087 
00088             /* Sort solutions. */
00089             if(x1 > x2) {
00090                 float tmp = x1;
00091                 x1 = x2;
00092                 x2 = tmp;
00093             }
00094             
00095             /* x1 is a solution. */
00096             if(x1 >= 0 && x1 <= treshold) {
00097                 *root = x1;
00098                 return true;
00099             }
00100 
00101             /* When x1 < 0 */
00102             if(x2 >= 0 && x2 <= treshold) {
00103                 *root = x2;
00104                 return true;
00105             }
00106             
00107             /* No solution found. */
00108             return false;
00109         }
00110 
00111         float MathManager::clamp(float a, float lower, float upper) const
00112         {
00113             if(a < lower)
00114                 return lower;
00115             if(a > upper)
00116                 return upper;
00117             return a;
00118         }

00120         float MathManager::toRadians(float degrees) const
00121         {
00122             return degrees * float(M_PI) / 180.0f;
00123         }
